questions.question_text:
A client plans to implement Dynamics 365 Finance.

The client is unsure whether to use a cloud-based or on-premises implementation.

For which scenario should the client install the on-premises version of the app?

choices.D: The client already has a significant infrastructure investment.
choices.C: The client needs to comply with federal regulations and keep their financial data at their headquarters location.
choices.A: The client has integrations that depend on direct Microsoft SQL access.
choices.B: The client is concerned about their retail stores losing internet connection and not being able to process offline store transactions.
